items.sentence: I want you to talk to Tom about his behavior.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to do that anymore.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to talk about that.
Tom wasn\'t the one who told Mary to do that.
Tom wasn\'t the only person in the classroom.
Tom wasn\'t willing to pay such a high price.
Tom wasn\'t willing to spend that much money.
Tom blushed a little and changed the subject.
I\'d like it if you would keep an eye on Tom.
I\'ll see about getting you something to eat.
Things didn\'t work out between Tom and Mary.
Tom spends all his free time studying French.
Tom walked over to the window and looked out.
Tom chose to go to Boston instead of Chicago.
Tom claimed he walked from Boston to Chicago.
Tom claims that he shot Mary in self-defense.
I wish I could\'ve done something about that.
Tom is precisely the person I\'m looking for.
We go out and have dinner together sometimes.
We had a heart-to-heart talk with each other.
